product_name: The North Face Pre-Hab Daypack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Retro style meets contemporary materials in The North Face Pre-Hab daypack. Part of a new Campus Collection, it's ready to rally with its rucksack style and an easy-access spot for your laptop. Large main compartment with cinch closure stores bulky items like books or a rain jacket. Padded laptop compartment carries most 15 in. laptops and is accessbile from the side or top. Vented, injection-molded shoulder straps are not only comfortable, but breathe well; pack includes a removable sternum strap. Back panel is made from comfortable, padded air-mesh. Zippered tricot-lined stash pocket on top lid. 2 quick-release buckles secure pack closed; side compression straps secure your load. The North Face Pre-Hab daypack has a top carry handle. Closeout.
short_description: Retro style meets contemporary materials in The North Face Pre-Hab daypack. Part of a new Campus Collection, it's ready to rally with its rucksack style and an easy-access spot for your laptop.
